SCL.name: SCL
SCL.description: I2C Interface Clock. Connect SCL to the logic rail through a 10-kOhm resistor. I2C target address is 0x6B. Supports standard mode (100kbit/s), fast mode (400kbit/s), and fast mode plus (1Mbit/s).

SDA.name: SDA
SDA.description: I2C Interface Data. Connect SDA to the logic rail through a 10-kOhm resistor. Open-drain output. I2C target address is 0x6B.

INT.name: INT
INT.description: Open Drain Interrupt Output. Connect the INT pin to a logic rail via 10-kOhm resistor. The INT pin sends an active low, 256-us pulse to host to report charger device status and faults.

STAT1.name: STAT1
STAT1.description: Open Drain Charge Status 1 Output. STAT1 and STAT2 indicate various charger operations. Connect to the pull up rail via 10-kOhm resistor. Pin function can be disabled via DIS_STAT_PINS bit. When disabled, can be used as general purpose indicator via FORCE_STAT1_ON bit.

STAT2.name: STAT2
STAT2.description: Open Drain Charge Status 2 Output. STAT1 and STAT2 indicate various charger operations. Connect to the pull up rail via 10-kOhm resistor. Pin function can be disabled via DIS_STAT_PINS bit. When disabled, can be used as general purpose indicator via FORCE_STAT2_ON bit.

PG.name: PG
PG.description: Open Drain Active Low Power Good Indicator. Connect to the pull up rail via 10-kOhm resistor. LOW indicates a good input source if VAC is within the programmed ACUV/ACOV operating window. Pin function can be disabled via DIS_PG_PIN bit.

CE.name: CE
CE.description: Active Low Charge Enable Pin. Battery charging is enabled when EN_CHG bit is 1 and CE pin is LOW. CE pin must be pulled HIGH or LOW, do not leave floating. Pin function can be disabled via DIS_CE_PIN bit. When disabled, can be used as general purpose indicator via FORCE_STAT4_ON bit.

TS.name: TS
TS.description: Temperature Qualification Voltage Input. Connect a negative temperature coefficient thermistor. Program temperature window with a resistor divider from REGN to TS to PGND. Charge suspends when TS pin voltage is out of range. Recommend 103AT-2 10-kOhm thermistor.

ICHG.name: ICHG
ICHG.description: Charge Current Limit Setting. ICHG pin sets the maximum charge current and can be used to monitor charge current. A programming resistor to PGND sets charge current limit as ICHG = KICHG / RICHG (KICHG typ 50 A*kOhm). Actual charge current limit is the lower of ICHG pin or ICHG_REG register bits. Pin function can be disabled via EN_ICHG_PIN bit. If not used, pull to PGND, do not leave floating.

ILIM_HIZ.name: ILIM_HIZ
ILIM_HIZ.description: Input Current Limit Setting and HIZ Mode Control Pin. ILIM_HIZ pin sets the maximum input current limit, can monitor input current, and can be pulled HIGH to force device into HIZ mode (VIH = 3.7V). A programming resistor to PGND sets input current limit as ILIM = KILIM / RILIM (KILIM typ 50 A*kOhm). Actual input current limit is the lower of ILIM_HIZ pin or IAC_DPM register bits. Pin function can be disabled via EN_ILIM_HIZ_PIN bit. If not used, pull to PGND, do not leave floating.

FBG.name: FBG
FBG.description: Voltage Feedback Divider Return. Connect to the bottom of battery feedback resistor. When charging, this pin is driven to PGND internally. When input voltage is outside of the ACUV/ACOV operating window, this pin is high-impedance, minimizing battery leakage current. RFBG to PGND: 33-55 Ohm.

FB.name: FB
FB.description: Charge Voltage Analog Feedback Adjustment. Connect the output of a resistive voltage divider from the battery terminals to this node to adjust the output battery regulation voltage. Nominal feedback voltage: 1.536V (default). Range: 1.504V to 1.566V. Accuracy: +/-0.5% (0 to 85C).

SRN.name: SRN
SRN.description: Charge Current-Sense Resistor, Negative Input. A 0.47-uF ceramic capacitor is placed from SRN to SRP for differential-mode filtering. An optional 0.1-uF ceramic capacitor from SRN to PGND for common-mode filtering. Recommended RBAT_SNS = 5 mOhm.

SRP.name: SRP
SRP.description: Charge Current-Sense Resistor, Positive Input. A 0.47-uF ceramic capacitor is placed from SRN to SRP for differential-mode filtering. A 0.1-uF ceramic capacitor from SRP to PGND for common-mode filtering. Differential voltage (SRP-SRN) abs max: -0.3V to 0.3V.

NC_15.name: NC
NC_15.description: No Connect. Leave this pin floating, do not tie to PGND.

NC_16.name: NC
NC_16.description: No Connect. Leave this pin floating, do not tie to PGND.

PGND_17.name: PGND
PGND_17.description: Tie this pin directly to PGND.

SW2.name: SW2
SW2.description: Boost Side Half Bridge Switching Node. Connect to the source of boost HS FET and the drain of boost LS FET. Connect the inductor between SW1 and SW2.

HIDRV2.name: HIDRV2
HIDRV2.description: Boost Side High-Side Gate Driver. Connect to the boost high-side N-channel MOSFET gate. Turn-on resistance: 3.4 Ohm typ. Turn-off resistance: 1.0 Ohm typ.

BTST2.name: BTST2
BTST2.description: Boost Side High-Side Power MOSFET Gate Driver Power Supply. Connect a capacitor between BTST2 and SW2 to provide bias to the high-side MOSFET gate driver. Bootstrap refresh threshold: 2.7V min, 3.1V typ, 3.9V max. Abs max BTST2 with respect to SW2: -0.3V to 14V.

LODRV2.name: LODRV2
LODRV2.description: Boost Side Low-Side Gate Driver. Connect to the boost low-side N-channel MOSFET gate. Turn-on resistance: 3.4 Ohm typ. Turn-off resistance: 1.0 Ohm typ. Dead time: 45ns typ.

PGND_22.name: PGND
PGND_22.description: Power Ground Return. The high current ground connection for the low-side gate drivers.

DRV_SUP.name: DRV_SUP
DRV_SUP.description: Charger Gate Drive Supply Input. Voltage on this pin drives the gates of buck-boost converter switching FETs. Connect a 4.7-uF ceramic capacitor from DRV_SUP to power ground. REGN LDO voltage can be used as gate driver supply by connecting REGN to DRV_SUP pin. In high-voltage applications, an external supply up to 12V can be used for higher efficiency. Under-voltage threshold: 3.7V typ rising. Over-voltage threshold: 12.8-13.6V rising.

REGN.name: REGN
REGN.description: Charger Internal Linear Regulator Output. Connect a 4.7-uF ceramic capacitor from REGN to power ground. REGN LDO output voltage: 4.8V min, 5.0V typ, 5.2V max (at 20mA). Current limit: 70mA typ. REGN can be used as gate driver supply by connecting to DRV_SUP. REGN OK threshold: 3.55V rising.

LODRV1.name: LODRV1
LODRV1.description: Buck Side Low-Side Gate Driver. Connect to the buck low-side N-channel MOSFET gate. Turn-on resistance: 3.4 Ohm typ. Turn-off resistance: 1.0 Ohm typ. Dead time: 45ns typ.

BTST1.name: BTST1
BTST1.description: Buck Side High-Side Power MOSFET Gate Driver Power Supply. Connect a capacitor between BTST1 and SW1 to provide bias to the high-side MOSFET gate driver. Bootstrap refresh threshold: 2.7V min, 3.1V typ, 3.9V max. Abs max BTST1 with respect to SW1: -0.3V to 14V.

HIDRV1.name: HIDRV1
HIDRV1.description: Buck Side High-Side Gate Driver. Connect to the buck high-side N-channel MOSFET gate. Turn-on resistance: 3.4 Ohm typ. Turn-off resistance: 1.0 Ohm typ.

SW1.name: SW1
SW1.description: Buck Side Half Bridge Switching Node. Connect to the source of buck HS FET and the drain of buck LS FET. Connect the inductor between SW1 and SW2.

ACN.name: ACN
ACN.description: Adapter Current-Sense Resistor, Negative Input. A 0.47-uF ceramic capacitor from ACN to ACP for differential-mode filtering. An optional 0.1-uF ceramic capacitor from ACN to PGND for common-mode filtering. Differential voltage (ACP-ACN) abs max: -0.3V to 0.3V. Recommended RAC_SNS = 5 mOhm (2 mOhm for higher current).

ACP.name: ACP
ACP.description: Adapter Current-Sense Resistor, Positive Input. A 0.47-uF ceramic capacitor from ACN to ACP for differential-mode filtering. A 0.1-uF ceramic capacitor from ACP to PGND for common-mode filtering.

NC_31.name: NC
NC_31.description: No Connect. Leave this pin floating, do not tie to PGND.

VAC_32.name: VAC
VAC_32.description: Input Voltage Detection and Power. Connect a 1-uF capacitor from pin to PGND. When Reverse Mode is enabled, pin 32 is regulated to VAC_REV. Operating range: 4.2V to 70V.

VAC_33.name: VAC
VAC_33.description: Input Voltage Detection and Power. Pin 33 is the input bias to power the IC. ACOV/ACUV resistor divider should be connected relative to pin 33. Operating range: 4.2V to 70V.

ACUV.name: ACUV
ACUV.description: AC Undervoltage Comparator Input. Connect a resistor divider from VAC to PGND to program undervoltage protection. When this pin falls below VREF_ACUV (1.095-1.106V), the device stops charging. The hardware limit for input voltage regulation is VACUV_DPM (1.198-1.222V). If ACUV programming is not used, pull this pin to VAC, do not leave floating.

ACOV.name: ACOV
ACOV.description: AC Overvoltage Comparator Input. Connect a resistor divider from VAC to PGND to program overvoltage protection. When this pin rises above VREF_ACOV (1.184-1.206V), the device stops charging. If ACOV programming is not used, pull this pin to PGND, do not leave floating.

FSW_SYNC.name: FSW_SYNC
FSW_SYNC.description: Switching Frequency and Synchronization Input. An external resistor to PGND sets the nominal switching frequency (200-600 kHz). RFSW_SYNC = 133kOhm for 250kHz, 50kOhm for 500kHz. This pin can also synchronize the PWM controller to an external clock with 200-600kHz frequency. SYNC VIH: 1.3V, VIL: 0.4V, pulse width: 80ns min.

ThermalPad.name: Thermal Pad
ThermalPad.description: Exposed pad beneath the IC. Always solder the thermal pad to the board, and have vias on the thermal pad plane star-connecting to PGND and ground plane for high-current power converter. Also serves as a thermal pad to dissipate heat. RthetaJC(bot): 2.5 C/W.

fields.name: VFB_REG
fields.description: FB Voltage Regulation Limit. POR: 1536mV (10h). Range: 1504mV-1566mV. Step: 2mV. Offset: 1504mV.

digital_physical_map.-1: VFB = 1504 + VALUE * 2 mV, where VALUE is the 5-bit VFB_REG value (0-31).

fields.name: ICHG_REG
fields.description: Fast Charge Current Regulation Limit with 5mOhm RBAT_SNS. Actual charge current is the lower of ICHG_REG and ICHG pin. POR: 20000mA (190h). Range: 400mA-20000mA. Step: 50mA.

digital_physical_map.-1: ICHG = (VALUE + 8) * 50 mA, where VALUE is the 9-bit ICHG_REG code. Clamped to 400-20000mA.

fields.name: IAC_DPM
fields.description: Input Current DPM Regulation Limit with 5mOhm RAC_SNS. Actual input current limit is the lower of IAC_DPM and ILIM_HIZ pin. POR: 20000mA (190h). Range: 400mA-20000mA. Step: 50mA.

digital_physical_map.-1: IAC = (VALUE + 8) * 50 mA, where VALUE is the 9-bit IAC_DPM code. Clamped to 400-20000mA.

fields.name: VAC_DPM
fields.description: Input Voltage Regulation Limit. If EN_MPPT=1, Full Sweep uses this as lower search window. POR: 4200mV (D2h). Range: 4200mV-65000mV. Step: 20mV.

digital_physical_map.-1: VAC_DPM = VALUE * 20 mV, where VALUE is the 12-bit VAC_DPM code. Clamped to 4200-65000mV.

fields.name: IAC_REV
fields.description: Input Current Regulation in Reverse Mode with 5mOhm RAC_SNS. POR: 20000mA (190h). Range: 400mA-20000mA. Step: 50mA.

fields.name: VAC_REV
fields.description: VAC Voltage Regulation in Reverse Mode. POR: 5000mV (FAh). Range: 3300mV-65000mV. Step: 20mV.

fields.name: IPRECHG
fields.description: Pre-charge current regulation limit with 5mOhm RBAT_SNS. Actual pre-charge current is the lower of IPRECHG and ICHG pin. POR: 4000mA (50h). Range: 250mA-10000mA. Step: 50mA.

fields.name: ITERM
fields.description: Termination Current Threshold with 5mOhm RBAT_SNS. Actual termination current is the lower of ITERM and ICHG pin if both enabled. POR: 2000mA (28h). Range: 250mA-10000mA. Step: 50mA.

fields.name: VBAT_LOWV
fields.description: Battery threshold for PRECHG to FASTCHG transition, as percentage of VFB_REG.

fields.name: EN_PRECHG
fields.description: Enable pre-charge and trickle charge functions.

fields.name: EN_TMR2X
fields.description: Charge safety timer speed in DPM.

digital_physical_map.1: Timer slowed by 2x during input DPM

fields.name: VRECHG
fields.description: Battery auto-recharge threshold, as percentage of VFB_REG.

digital_physical_map.1: Reset (bit goes back to 0 after timer reset)

fields.name: EN_CHG_BIT_RESET_BEHAVIOR
fields.description: Controls EN_CHG bit behavior when WATCHDOG expires.

fields.name: EN_IBAT_LOAD
fields.description: Battery Load (IBAT_LOAD) Enable. Sinks current from SRN to GND. Recommend to disable IBAT ADC while active.

fields.name: FORCE_STAT4_ON
fields.description: CE_STAT4 pin override. Can only be forced on if DIS_CE_PIN=1.

fields.name: FORCE_STAT3_ON
fields.description: PG_STAT3 pin override. Can only be forced on if DIS_PG_PIN=1.

fields.name: FORCE_STAT2_ON
fields.description: STAT2 pin override. Can only be forced on if DIS_STAT_PINS=1.

fields.name: FORCE_STAT1_ON
fields.description: STAT1 pin override. Can only be forced on if DIS_STAT_PINS=1.

digital_physical_map.1: Reset (bit goes back to 0 after register reset)

fields.name: EN_PFM
fields.description: Enable PFM mode in light-load. Note this bit is reset upon valid SYNC signal detection on FSW_SYNC pin.

fields.name: FORCE_SWEEP
fields.description: Force Full Panel Sweep and reset MPPT timers.

fields.name: EN_MPPT
fields.description: MPPT algorithm control. When enabled, ADC is controlled by device and writes to REG2A are ignored.

fields.name: JEITA_VSET
fields.description: JEITA Warm (T3<TS<T5) regulation voltage setting, as % of VFB_REG.

fields.name: JEITA_ISETH
fields.description: JEITA Warm (T3<TS<T5) regulation current setting, as % of ICHG_REG.

fields.name: JEITA_ISETC
fields.description: JEITA Cool (T1<TS<T2) regulation current setting, as % of ICHG_REG.

fields.name: EN_TS
fields.description: TS pin function control (applies to forward charging and reverse discharging modes).

fields.name: BHOT
fields.description: Reverse Mode TS HOT temperature threshold control.

fields.name: BCOLD
fields.description: Reverse Mode TS COLD temperature threshold control.

fields.name: VAC_MPP
fields.description: Input Voltage for Max Power Point detected. POR: 0mV. Range: 0-60000mV. Step: 20mV.

digital_physical_map.-1: VAC_MPP = VALUE * 20 mV. Clamped high at 60000mV.

digital_physical_map.1: In Input Current regulation (ILIM pin or IAC_DPM)
In Input Voltage regulation (VAC_DPM or VSYS_REV)

fields.name: MPPT_STAT
fields.description: Max Power Point Tracking Algorithm status.

fields.name: DRV_OKZ_STAT
fields.description: DRV_SUP pin voltage status. In battery-only mode with ADC disabled, this bit always reads 1.

digital_physical_map.1: DRV_SUP pin voltage is out of valid range

fields.name: ADC_DONE_FLAG
fields.description: ADC conversion INT flag (one-shot mode only). ClearOnRead.

fields.name: IAC_DPM_FLAG
fields.description: Input Current regulation INT flag. ClearOnRead.

fields.name: VAC_DPM_FLAG
fields.description: Input Voltage regulation INT flag. ClearOnRead.

fields.name: WD_FLAG
fields.description: I2C Watchdog timer INT flag. ClearOnRead.

fields.name: CHARGE_FLAG
fields.description: Charge cycle INT flag. ClearOnRead. Set when CHARGE_STAT bits changed.

fields.name: PG_FLAG
fields.description: Input Power Good INT flag. ClearOnRead.

fields.name: FSW_SYNC_FLAG
fields.description: FSW_SYNC pin signal INT flag. ClearOnRead.

fields.name: MPPT_FLAG
fields.description: Max Power Point Tracking INT flag. ClearOnRead.

fields.name: CHG_TMR_FLAG
fields.description: Charge safety timer INT flag. ClearOnRead.

fields.name: DRV_OKZ_FLAG
fields.description: DRV_SUP pin voltage INT flag. ClearOnRead.

digital_physical_map.1: ADC_DONE does not produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: CV Timer expired produces INT pulse
FSW_SYNC status change produces INT pulse

fields.name: MPPT_MASK
fields.description: Max Power Point Tracking INT mask.

digital_physical_map.0: MPPT_STAT rising edge produces INT pulse

fields.name: ADC_EN
fields.description: ADC control. When EN_VREG_TEMP_COMP=1, ADC is automatically enabled regardless.

digital_physical_map.0: Start average using existing register value
digital_physical_map.1: Start average using new ADC conversion

fields.name: IBAT_ADC_DIS
fields.description: IBAT ADC control. Recommend to disable when EN_IBAT_LOAD=1.

fields.name: VFB_ADC_DIS
fields.description: VFB ADC control. Recommend to disable when charging is enabled.

fields.name: IAC_ADC
fields.description: IAC ADC reading with 5mOhm RAC_SNS. 2s complement. Range: -20000mA to 20000mA. Step: 0.8mA.

digital_physical_map.-1: IAC = VALUE * 0.8 mA (2s complement), where VALUE is the 16-bit register value.

fields.name: IBAT_ADC
fields.description: IBAT ADC reading with 5mOhm RBAT_SNS. 2s complement. Range: -20000mA to 20000mA. Step: 2mA.

digital_physical_map.-1: IBAT = VALUE * 2 mA (2s complement), where VALUE is the 16-bit register value.

fields.name: VAC_ADC
fields.description: VAC ADC reading. Unsigned integer. Range: 0-65534mV. Step: 2mV.

digital_physical_map.-1: VAC = VALUE * 2 mV, where VALUE is the 16-bit register value.

fields.name: VBAT_ADC
fields.description: VBAT ADC reading. Unsigned integer. Range: 0-65534mV. Step: 2mV.

digital_physical_map.-1: VBAT = VALUE * 2 mV, where VALUE is the 16-bit register value.

fields.name: TS_ADC
fields.description: TS ADC reading as percentage of REGN. Unsigned integer. Range: 0-99.9%. Step: 0.098%.

digital_physical_map.-1: TS = VALUE * 0.09765625 %, where VALUE is the 16-bit register value (only 10 bits used).
VFB = VALUE * 1 mV, where VALUE is the 16-bit register value (only 11 bits used).

fields.name: BOOST_HS_DRV
fields.description: Boost High Side FET Gate Driver Strength.

fields.name: BUCK_HS_DRV
fields.description: Buck High Side FET Gate Driver Strength.

fields.name: BOOST_LS_DRV
fields.description: Boost Low Side FET Gate Driver Strength.

fields.name: BUCK_LS_DRV
fields.description: Buck Low Side FET Gate Driver Strength.

fields.name: BOOST_DEAD_TIME
fields.description: Boost Side FETs Dead Time Control.

fields.name: BUCK_DEAD_TIME
fields.description: Buck Side FETs Dead Time Control.

fields.name: IBAT_REV
fields.description: Reverse mode battery discharge current limit.

fields.name: EN_CONV_FAST_TRANSIENT
fields.description: Enable converter fast transient response in reverse mode only.
